summary: Last year, Tor and Humble Bundle ran a deal where you could get a whole bunch of my books for cheap, and some of the proceeds would go to First Book, a terrific literacy charity whose goals (give books to kids. ) I fully support.  It did extremely well...
title: The (Three Day Only) Return of the Scalzi Humble Bundle

summary:

title: Expect obstacles
